Its a place where young parents who are barely into adulthood themselves either by age or maturity dump Off their unruly little troublemakers, saddling decent teachers with ever-increasing homerooms making them into proverbial cage-cleaners and the zookeepers themselves(i.e. principals) end up taking aÂ lackadaisicalÂ approach to running their campuses by eitherÂ ignoringÂ serious issues or just plain giving up. In other words, they punch a clock for a check and thats about it...
